title: Lindsey Buckingham - Gift Of Screws - The Intended Version
description:
This is not the "Gift Of Screws" album which Lindsey Buckingham released recently.  What this album represents is the release he intended to make around the year 2001.  Since being talked out of releasing what would have been considered his finest album, 7 of the songs were released on Fleetwood Mac's "Say You Will" album and 5 more songs were spread between his two solo albums.  Three of these songs (Got To Get Away, Deep Dense & My Little Demon) are unreleased so they are still in a 'demo' format.  The remaining songs are released Fleetwood Mac & Lindsey Buckingham songs which I rearranged to go in almost the same order as his intended bootleg release.  I decided to exclude the Rolling Stone cover songs (except Gotta Get Away) as those songs don't really fit on the album and he was probably not going to include them on it anyway.  Please enjoy Mr. Buckingham's lost masterpiece.


The Tracklist:
 
1.Someone's gotta change your mind 
2.Miranda 
3.Steal your heart away 
4.Red rover 
5.Come 
6.Down on rodeo 
7.Gotta Get Away - Rolling Stones cover song
8.Try for the sun 
9.Shuffle Riff (Wait For You) 
10.Murrow 
11.Gift of Screws
12.Bleet to Love Her 
13.Twist of Fate 
14.Say Goodbye 
15.Deep Dense - Unreleased Demo
16.My Little Demon - Unreleased Demo
